snippet: BAER--Theodore Charles Jr.,died on February 29, a lifelong resident of NYC. Born March 6, 1930 in Jersey City to Theodore Charles Baer Sr. and Alice Eggers. Survived by his wife of 23 years, Dora Kim, son Gregory Hamilton (Felicia), daughter-in-law Laurie, four grandchildren and many nieces and nephews. Ted was predeceased by his wife Anne Gregory Baer and their son Ted III. A memorial service will be held in NYC in the spring. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BAER--Theodore Charles Jr.,died on February 29, a lifelong resident of NYC. Born March 6, 1930 in Jersey City to Theodore Charles Baer Sr. and Alice Eggers. Survived by his wife of 23 years, Dora Kim, son Gregory Hamilton (Felicia), daughter-in-law Laurie, four grandchildren and many nieces and nephews. Ted was predeceased by his wife Anne Gregory Baer and their son Ted III. A memorial service will be held in NYC in the spring. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BAER, THEODORE CHARLES JR.
